statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, value FROM sensor_data WHERE device_id = 1 ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND value > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, device_id, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE device_id IN (2, 3, 5) ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, device_id, sensor_type FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, value FROM sensor_data WHERE device_id = 101 ORDER BY value ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT AVG(value) AS average_value, sensor_type FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 100 ORDER BY average_value DESC;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(sensor_id) AS num_readings FROM sensor_data GROUP BY device_id HAVING num_readings > 50 ORDER BY num_readings DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_readings, FLOOR(AVG(value)) AS average_value FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_name, location, value FROM sensor_data ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE location='Room A';
SELECT sensor_name, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 50;
SELECT * FROM device_info ORDER BY installation_date ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location, reading, value FROM sensor_data ORDER BY reading DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM device_info WHERE device_type = 'Temperature Sensor'
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC
SELECT device_name, installation_date FROM device_info WHERE installation_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01'
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location, reading FROM sensor_data JOIN device_info ON sensor_data.sensor_id = device_info.device_id
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT device_id, sensor_type, reading_value FROM sensors ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, AVG(reading_value) AS avg_reading FROM sensors GROUP BY sensor_type;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE location = 'Room A';
SELECT sensor_id, data_value, data_timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE data_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, reading_value FROM sensors WHERE reading_value > 50 ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, data_value, data_timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE data_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-15' ORDER BY data_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensors s JOIN devices d ON s.device_id = d.device_id WHERE d.location = 'Room A' ORDER BY s.sensor_id ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, reading_timestamp FROM sensors WHERE reading_value < 30 OR reading_value > 70 ORDER BY reading_value DESC, sensor_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_type, value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT device_name, location FROM device_info ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature FROM room_data;
SELECT automation_id, action FROM automation LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM device_info WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung';
SELECT room_name, temperature, humidity FROM room_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60 ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT automation_id, action, schedule FROM automation WHERE device_id = 123 AND status = TRUE;
SELECT sensor_id, device_id, sensor_type, value, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE value BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC
SELECT room_name, floor_id FROM rooms WHERE floor_id = 2
SELECT floor_name FROM floors
SELECT username, email FROM users
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE location = 'Building A' AND device_name LIKE '%sensor%'
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(sensor_id) AS sensor_count FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY sensor_count DESC
SELECT room_name, floor_name FROM rooms JOIN floors ON rooms.floor_id = floors.floor_id
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5)
